## RStudio in the Cloud

The easiest way to use R on a cloud server is via [RStudio Cloud](https://rstudio.cloud). You can create your own projects once you have an account with RStudio Cloud, or you may have been invited by an instructor for an R Workshop. 

When you first log on to RStudio Cloud, you will be able to access your workspace, which might look something like this:

![png](./images/first-page-in-rstudio-cloud.png)

Along the left side are some interesting options. Select `Primers` to be presented with this screen:

![png](./images/primer-page.png)
